attributes.action: Compel car manufacturers to limit the weight of vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By introducing weight limits to standard vehicles you would see a vast reduction in emissions (95% of engine output moves the car rather than the passengers). You would also reduce impact energy in crashes thus reducing the likelihood of injury to all road users. Lighter cars are more efficient, safer for others and more maneuverable.
